articles.title: Don't have an answer to it: Sumona Chakravarti on absence from 'The Great Indian Kapil Sharma Show' - Deccan Herald
articles.description: Mumbai, May 19 (PTI) Actor Sumona Chakravarti says she has been on her own journey and doesn't have an answer about her absence from the celebrity comedy talk show “The Great Indian Kapil Sharma Show”, hosted by her frequent collaborator Kapil Sharma.
articles.content: Asked why she isn't a part of The Great Indian Kapil Sharma Show, she told PTI: I dont have an answer to this. The show that I was part of, which was on another channel, ended last year in July. Sinc… [+288 chars]
